oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mardi Gras Float List
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Mystic Memphi; parades;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of proposed floats for the Mardi Gras festival of 1874; typewritten copy taken from an Edict of the Memphi; describes costumes, and characters required for ten floats including "The Orchestra," "Infancy," "Francies of Childhood," "Youth," "Maturity or Manhood," "Age," "Time," and "Future."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
